name: lol-pickem
description: A Pick'em style game for League of Legends fans.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd api && npm run dev:watch" "cd lol-pickem-app && npm run start"
scripts.push-api-heroku: git push heroku-api `git subtree split --prefix api alpha-release`:master --force
scripts.deploy-api: cd api && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run push-api-heroku
scripts.deploy-app: cd lol-pickem-app && ng build --prod && cd ../ && netlify deploy --prod --dir=./lol-pickem-app/dist/lol-pickem-app
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-app && npm run deploy-api

author: Sydney Heller
